column3: I'd rather not, as we'll be switching to sendmsg soon, instead taking advantage of scatter/gather which is highly preferable as it only requires one syscall. I've implemented this here: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11227/commits/77cee166e17e355306d2ca1a1d360e71c12d8350 as part of #11227. It may make sense to go ahead and take that change rather than waiting for all of the other libevent
Thanks for the contribution, but I agree it'd be better to not change this in the mean time until @theuni's change (hopefully soon) will go in.
